song.title: Did You Feel the Mountains Tremble
song.lyrics:
[1] .C Did you feel the mountains tremble .F/A Did you hear the oceans roar .Dm7 When the people rose to sing of .F Gsus4 C Jesus Christ the risen One
[P1] . F/A C And we can see that God You're moving . F/A C A mighty river through the nations . F/A C And young and old will turn to Jesus || .Dm7 Fling wide you heavenly gates, .F/A Gsus C prepare the way of the risen Lord
[C] .C F/A Open up the doors and let the music play .Dm7 C Gsus let the streets resound with singing || .C Songs that bring Your hope .F/A Songs that bring Your joy .Dm7 C Gsus4 dancers who dance upon injustice ---
[2] Did you feel the people tremble Did you hear the singers roar When the lost began to sing of Jesus Christ the saving One
[3] Do you feel the darkness tremble when all the saints join in one song And all the streams flow as one river to wash away our brokenness
[p2] . F/A C And here we see that God You're moving . F/A C A time of jubilee is coming . F/A C When young and old return to Jesus || .F/D Fling wide you heavenly gates .F/A Gsus C Prepare the way of the risen Lord
